pattern_name: Resume Review and Contact Info Extraction
workflow_steps: Step 1: Open candidate resume in Word
Step 3: Switch to Excel contact spreadsheet
Step 4: Enter candidate contact information from resume into spreadsheet
automation_reasoning: Structured data extraction from resumes is feasible with modern OCR and NLP. Contact information follows predictable patterns and can be automatically parsed.
business_value: Reduces manual data entry, eliminates errors, speeds up candidate processing
implementation_approach: RPA bot with document processing capabilities (OCR + NLP) to extract contact details from resumes and populate Excel

automation_reasoning: Status checking could be automated with automated alerts and notifications rather than manual dashboard checks
implementation_approach: Setup automated alerts and notifications based on monitoring status
